DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine short-term effect manual therapy protocol pain , disability cervical range motion individual acute whiplash injury .
DOC.brief_title: Manual Therapy Treat Acute Whiplash Injury
DOC.detailed_description: Design : Randomized clinical trial . Objectives : determine short-term effect manual therapy protocol pain , disability cervical range motion individual acute whiplash injury . Methods measure : sixty patient randomly assign 1 2 group : experimental group receive manual therapy protocol placebo group receive two manual therapy technique . Neck pain , disability cervical range motion data collect baseline 24-hr last manual therapy application . Mixed-model analysis variance use examine effect treatment outcome variable .
DOC.criteria: To meet Quebec Task Force Classification WAD II neck pain symptom musculoskeletal sign . No evidence conduction loss clinical neurological examination . Concussion motor vehicle accident . Loss consciousness . Head upper quadrant injury accident . Sought treatment prior accident neck pain . A previous history whiplash Neck pain Headaches Psychiatric psychologic condition Neurologic circulatory disorder
